ComicInfo.Summary:
The resurrected KISS lends their protection to an innocent whose destiny puts her in the sights of the deadly Illuminati. KISS will put their new abilities to the test when they fight the most powerful foe they've met yet, while trying to save the girl and letting her fulfill a prophecy that spells trouble for the evil cabal!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Stuart Sayger | 1 | B | Cover B | Rodney Buchemi (a) & Adriano Augusto (c) | 2 | C | Cover C | Maria Sanapo (a) & Ceci de la Cruz (c) | 3 | D/Sub | Subscription Cover D | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Maria Sanapo | 7 | H/RE | Jetpack Exclusive Variant Cover | Jim Balent | 8 | I/RE | Jetpack Exclusive Variant Cover (Black & White) | Jim Balent | 9 | J/RE | Jetpack Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Jim Balent | 10 |
